alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 7:14PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Collier, southeastern Hendry and Broward Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 714 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Hendry Correctional, or 21 miles east of Ave Maria, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ave Maria, Immokalee, Hendry Correctional, Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, Big Cypress National Preserve, Sunniland and Bunker Hill. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County
